page.title: 02MY NEIGHBOURHOOD.
page.content: I have lived in my three bedroomed semi detached house all my life and I like it very much. The roads are very quiet so we can play rounders. We sometimes play in our gardens because they are quite large. Most of our neighbours are quite old but they are nice. There is a cricket field near us where we sometimes have picnics. There is a station near us and two pubs. There are squash courts, bowling greens and tennis courts. One of my neighbours has an air raid shelter in his back garden.
